definitions.definition: To force (something) into (a tight space); to squeeze (something) into (a schedule, etc); to exert great effort to insert or include (something); to include (something) despite potent reasons not to.
To force some current event into alignment with some (usually unconnected) agenda, especially when it is fallacious.

secondary_definitions: ( transitive , figuratively ) To force (something) into (a tight space); to squeeze (something) into (a schedule, etc); to exert great effort to insert or include (something); to include (something) despite potent reasons not to.
( transitive , figurative ) To force some current event into alignment with some (usually unconnected) agenda, especially when it is fallacious.
